sentences.sContent: Environmental issues such as noise and level of alertness may interfere with learning new behaviors.
sentences.sContent_eng: Environmental issues such as noise and level of alertness may interfere with learning new behaviors.
sentences.sCn: 环境问题诸如噪音和警戒的水平也许会妨碍新行为的学习。

sentences.sContent: In order to use the alertness approach in selecting a managerial style, you have to determine what each of your employees needs from you.
sentences.sContent_eng: In order to use the alertness approach in selecting a managerial style, you have to determine what each of your employees needs from you.
sentences.sCn: 为了机敏地选择管理风格，你必须确定每一个下属的工作需求。 也就是他们到底需要你给予多少管控和/或鼓励？
